New_York.Soho Synagogue: Soho Synagogue is a "hipster" synagogue located in SoHo, a neighborhood in Manhattan, New York. On September 15, 2009, The SoHo Synagogue signed a 7-year lease for the ground floor of 43 Crosby Street, located between Spring and Broome Streets. Designer Dror Benshetrit designed the synagogue space.
